DOC.brief_summary: Data study collect therapist across world . The therapist share data already compile caseload . Data strip personal identifier personal health information . The TWU SCOPE research team contact client whose assessment data share secondary analysis clinical data repository . For educational training purpose client videotape therapist obtain consent and/or assent client . Not every client videotape . The subject data share therapist age 0-21 , male female , ethnicity . The total amount data collect participate therapist 500 piece .
DOC.detailed_description: Therapists recruit TWU SCOPE research team member via email . Therapists wish participate send data share letter PI study . Once TWU SCOPE research team receive data share letter , clinical data packet distribute therapist U.S. mail email send contain web address link http : //www.myweb.twu.edu/~ttioseco access clinical data packet via internet . Those therapist collect ten piece de-identified data send TWU SCOPE research team receive incentive form gift card . Flow Chart Research Study Process Collaborators ( share new de-identified data ) → databank ( new de-identified data input ) → data analysis ( analysis new old de-identified data ) → publication/presentation No risk involve data collect without personal identifier .
DOC.criteria: Subjects receive therapy participate therapist . Age 21 .
